sqlMap.insert: insert into fileTestReview (num, subject, saveFileName, originalFileName) values (#num#, #subject#, #saveFileName#, #originalFileName#)
sqlMap.select: select * from( select rownum rnum, data.* from( select num, subject, saveFileName, originalFileName from fileTestReview order by num desc) data) where rnum>=#start# and rnum<=#end#
select num, subject, saveFileName, originalFileName from fileTestReview where num = #num#
